00029                 FG_BLUE = 0x0001,               
00030                 FG_GREEN = 0x0002,              
00031                 FG_RED = 0x0004,                
00032                 FG_INTENSITY = 0x0008,          
00033                 BG_BLUE = 0x0010,

00035                 BG_RED = 0x0040,

00037         #    if !defined ( ANSI_COLOUR ) && defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )

00044                 FG_GRAY = FG_BLUE | FG_GREEN | FG_RED,                  
00045                 FG_WHITE = FG_BLUE | FG_GREEN | FG_RED | FG_INTENSITY,  
00046                 BG_GRAY = BG_BLUE | BG_GREEN | BG_RED,                  
00047                 BG_WHITE = BG_BLUE | BG_GREEN | BG_RED | BG_INTENSITY   
00048         #    elif defined ( ANSI_COLOUR )
00049                 FG_BROWN = 0x0100,          
00050                 FG_MAGENTA = 0x0200,        
00051                 FG_CYAN = 0x0400,           
00052                 BG_BROWN = 0x0800,          
00053                 BG_MAGENTA = 0x1000,        
00054                 BG_CYAN = 0x2000,           
00055                 FG_GRAY = 0x4000,           
00056                 FG_WHITE = 0x8000,          
00057                 BG_GRAY = 0x10000,          
00058                 BG_WHITE = 0x20000          
00059         #    endif
